name: dash0-sdk-web
description: Dash0's Web SDK to collect telemetry from end-users' web browsers

scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:typescript && pnpm run build:rollup && pnpm run build:minify && pnpm run build:stats
scripts.build:minify: google-closure-compiler --compilation_level=ADVANCED --language_in=ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out=ECMASCRIPT_2020 --js_output_file=dist/script/dash0.min.js --jscomp_off checkVars --jscomp_off checkTypes --create_source_map='%outname%.map' --formatting=SINGLE_QUOTES dist/script/dash0.js && echo "//# sourceMappingURL=dash0.min.js.map" >> dist/script/dash0.min.js && sed -i.bak 's#"dist/script/#"#' dist/script/dash0.min.js.map && rm dist/script/dash0.min.js.map.bak
scripts.build:stats:
echo "
File Stats:" && ls dist/script/*.js | xargs -I '%' bash -c 'echo "%: $(./node_modules/.bin/gzip-size % --include-original) (gzip)"'

author: Dash0 Inc.
